name: Snarf - Windows Port
description:
This is my experimental game from 2018, the port is not complete, but the game can be played through. The game's code was made from scratch. Graphics were exported from the original game.
The original DOS Shareware 2.03 version by Everett Kaser is included in the download.

Gameplay:
To start the game press a key.
Arrow keys - Move
W,A,S,D - Shoot
SPACE - Pause
Your goal is to reach the right side of the level while getting more points and defending yourself from the snarf monsters.

More information is in the readme file.

Changes from the DOS version:

- No demo, highscore, editor
- Very basic AI
- Fixed controls, speed
- Editable sprites, sounds
- Minor elements missing

Minimum system requirements:
- Windows XP or newer
- .Net Framework 2.0
- Directx 9.0
- 256 MB RAM
- 1.0 Ghz CPU
- 4 MB Video Memory
- 2 MB free space
- 1 MB after install

GitHub:
https://github.com/kurtis2222/snarf-win32
